summary: Test suite that validates the integration of napari-based workflows within the Fractal image‑analysis framework, covering dimension handling, relabeling logic, empty ROI tables, and data preparation for 2D/3D OME‑Zarr inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee that napari workflow wrappers function correctly in production pipelines, preventing errors in dimensionality, label mapping, and ROI handling, thereby supporting reliable biomedical image processing.
